message.content: {"id": "102516", "title": "Bug 102516 - JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand", "description": "The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in the data source. On the iSeries platform using the JTOpen JDBC drivers, this tree control shows every schema (also known as catalog) on the system, which can easily be several hundred tables. Currently, the tree control is being populated on load, causing a warning message to appear. The issue is observed when using the code from CVS on 6/30/05.", "OB": "When using the JTOpen JDBC drivers on the iSeries platform, the tree control in the JDBC Data Set Editor loads every schema on the system on page load, resulting in a large number of tables being displayed. This causes a warning message to appear.", "EB": "The load of the tree control in the JDBC Data Set Editor should be deferred until the user expands the tree or applies a filter.", "SR": "Modify the JDBC Data Set Editor to load tables and columns in the tree control on demand when the user expands the tree or applies a filter."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '102516', 'title': 'Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand', 'description': 'Bug 102516JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists thetables and columns in your data source. ', 'OB': 'On the iSeries platform using the JTOpenJDBC drivers, this tree control shows every schema (aka catalog) on the system.This is easly several hundred tables. Using the code in CVS from6/30/05, I see the schema filter, however I still have the warning message onload since the tree is being populated on load. ', 'EB': 'Could the load of the tree bedeferred until the user expands the tree or applys a filter? ', 'SR': ''}
